result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Minutes:  14CM1137/14CT174/15CM148/15CM265/15CM790.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Matt Perz.  Cases are resolved.

14CM1137 - deft pleads guilty to count 2; found guilty by the Court.  Deft sentenced to 2 days KCJ on each count concurrent.  Credit for 2 days served.  Costs rolled into sentence.  Count 3 is dismissed & read-in per plea agreement.    Court will consider expunction on count 2 if defense counsel submits authority for this request.

15CM790 - deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  Deft sentenced to 22 days KCJ.  Credit for 22 days served.  Costs rolled into sentence.  Remaining counts dismissed & read-in on State's motion per plea agreement.  Expunction is granted.

14CT174 - dismissed & read-in on State's motion per plea agreement

15CM148 - dismissed & read-in on State's motion per plea agreement

15CM265 - dismissed & read-in on State's motion per plea agreement
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

131pm  Special Prosecutor Attorney Jerrold Hinshaw appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Matt Perz.  Clerk: LE  Warrant vacated.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  PTC set for 7/10/15 @ 115pm & FPT set for 8/12/15 @ 930am & Jury Selection set for 8/31/15 @ 9am.  $250  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  kmk

*Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.
343.05(3)(a) - Operate w/o valid Licence - 2nd  946.49(1)(a) - Misd bail jumping - 2 Cts
Warrant served, def. in custody.  Return on warrant today at 1:00 before Intake Commissioner.
2:17   Attorney Patricia Riley appeared for the State.  Clerk:  LE.    No appearance by defendant. Warrant Authorized. Cash bond set at $100.
State's List of Witnesses and Demand for Discovery -filed by ADA, Jessica Krejcarek  kmk
